description: The foursome were enjoying some family fun in Barbados on Saturday, having previously been known to jet to Miami and Palma, Majorca in search of winter sun over the New Year break.
title: Louise Redknapp and shirtless Jamie enjoy family holiday in Barbados
title_page: Louise Redknapp and shirtless Jamie enjoy family holiday in Barbados | Daily Mail Online
text:
Louise Redknapp appeared to take some time out on Saturday as the family continued their annual New Year beach break.
As husband Jamie entertained sons Charley, 11, and Beau, seven, in the sea, she hung back on the sand, enjoying a little R&R.
The foursome were enjoying some family fun in Barbados, having previously been known to jet to Miami and Palma, Majorca in search of winter sun.
Scroll down for video
Supervising: Louise Redknapp stayed on the sand on Saturday as her three boys enjoyed an action-packed day in Barbados
Louise supervised from the sunbeds, sticking her hands on her hips as she sought shade beneath a pink umbrella on Saturday.
She was looking toned in a black bikini, which she paired with a holiday-ready tie-dye skirt for the beach day.
The popstar-turned-fashionista also perched a pair of sunglasses on her nose to complete the look; bangles filling up her wrists for more of a bohemian holiday vibe.
Keeping them entertained: Footballer husband Jamie, meanwhile, spent time entertaining sons Charley, 11, and Beau, seven, in the sea
Superfit Jamie was more hands on with the children that day and headed down to the water to keep them busy.
The footballer showed off her six pack in a pair of thigh-skimming navy blue swimming shorts as he played with his youngest in the surf, diving and dipping in the crystal waters.
A wet-haired Jamie later rejoined Louise on the loungers and they amused themselves with the family gadgets and her chosen holiday read, Jane Green's Summer Secrets.
Playful: The father-of-two dragged his youngest son through the water as part of a fun game
Taking a dip: As he emerged, he showed off the true extent of his athletic physique
The family's last holiday was in July when they headed to the Balearic Islands, having last year rung in 2015 at the beachside in Miami.
Despite taking a break to relax, Louise hasn't let her commitment to the style snaps that fill up her Instagram account, where she also acts as one half of best friend blogger duo A Style Album.
She wrote beside one outfit post: 'So Lovley spending time with my family #hols #goodtimes , looking forward to getting back to work @astylealbum @wild_about_beauty #2016'
Family time: Later, the family man rejoined his wife at the sunbeds
